channel.title: CVE Feed for auth0 -- lock

item.title: CVE-2020-15119|2024-08-04T13:08:21.963Z -- auth0 -- lock
item.description: In auth0-lock versions before and including 11.25.1, dangerouslySetInnerHTML is used to update the DOM. When dangerouslySetInnerHTML is used, the application and its users might be exposed to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks.
